channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Machine Learning Is Transforming Portfolio Optimization
item.description: Using machine learning algorithms in portfolio optimization is a growing trend that investors should pay attention to.

item.title: Florida and Texas boomtowns are awash in a glut of condos
item.description: It comes down to skyhigh homeowners association fees and insurance costs, according to an analysis from Redfin.

item.title: GOP questions watchdog's report on National Guard response to Jan. 6

item.title: California’s Environmental Policies Are Backfiring
item.description: The Golden State must work to correct previous government blunders by revitalizing nuclear power and expanding proactive forest management.

item.title: Michigan Secretary Of State Threatens Election Officials Again, Calls Russia Hoaxer ‘Champion For Democracy’
item.description: Benson claimed those with election integrity concerns are acting in bad faith to suppress voting.

item.title: The DOJ can’t break up Nvidia party, the stock is staying high, BofA says
item.description: Reports of a possible DOJ inquiry into the chip manufacturer are unlikely to affect the stock—for now.

item.title: House GOP presses Hochul on alleged CCP agent's influence in New York, including secret Chinese police station
item.description: Rep. Claudia Tenney penned a letter demanding answers from New York Gov. Kathy Hochul on former senior aide Linda Sun's influence in state government.

item.title: Navy secretary slapped with Hatch Act violation for urging Biden's reelection

item.title: Kathy Hochul’s Chinese Connection
item.description: Americans need to wake up to the subversion campaign from our communist adversary.

item.title: New Kennedy-Backed Pro-Trump PAC Launches To ‘Make America Healthy Again’
item.description: Former senior staffers from Robert F. Kennedy Jr.'s independent presidential campaign launched a new PAC to elect Donald Trump.

item.description: Big data-driven AI in financial services is a technology that augments human capabilities. We are living in countries governed by the rule of law, and...

item.title: Bolt CEO: Department stores are rising from the ashes
item.description: To write off department stores entirely would be premature. These institutions have weathered economic storms before.

item.title: School Choice Is Not a Secret Plot to Promote ‘Christian Nationalism’

item.title: FL’s Amendment 4 Backers Show Underage Girls How To Get Abortions Without Parents’ Permission
item.description: Florida’s unlimited abortion amendment puts women’s health, babies' lives, and parents’ rights at grave risk.

item.title: Market Efficiency vs. Behavioral Finance: Which Strategy Delivers Better Returns?
item.description: Team Efficient Markets vs. Team Behavioral Finance: It's the academic equivalent of Lakers vs. Celtics.

item.title: A musician siphoned $10 million in royalties after using AI to create hundreds of thousands of songs, streaming them billions of times
item.description: Michael Smith, 52, of Cornelius, North Carolina, was arrested on fraud and conspiracy charges. He faces up to 60 years in prison.

item.title: Harris campaign celebrates backing from Liz Cheney
item.description: The Harris campaign said it was "proud" to receive an endorsement from former GOP Rep. Liz Cheney, a longtime foe of former President Donald Trump.

item.title: Republicans’ Chances of Taking the Senate Are Looking Great
item.description: Even if Harris sweeps the swing states and wins the White House, a whole lot would have to go wrong for the GOP to remain in the Senate minority.

item.title: How Each Lawfare Jihad Against Trump Might Crumble Under SCOTUS Immunity Ruling
item.description: Jack Smith's lawfare in D.C. isn't the only 'get Trump' case that may fall apart after the Supreme Court's immunity ruling.

item.title: Mars chief reveals his secrets to leadership success: Slow down, learn from failures, embrace feedback
item.description: Anton Vincent, president of Mars North America, underscored the value of constructive feedback in shaping a career.

item.title: The Beautiful Presidency
item.description: Trump promises to provide the most aesthetically pleasing administration you’ve ever seen.

item.title: Russia’s Vladimir Putin Says The Kremlin Wants Kamala Harris To Win The Election
item.description: "[Biden] recommended that all of his supporters support Harris, so we will as well," Putin reportedly said.
